source: （仕事終わりに、美希とカフェに来ている……）
translatedstr: (After work, Miki and I are at a cafe ......)

source:
ん？　どうした、美希。
俺のことをじーっと見たりして……
translatedstr:
Hm? What's wrong, Miki?
They stare at me and stuff. ......

source:
なんだかハニーが変わった気がして、
どこが変わったのかなって、探してたの☆
translatedstr:
I felt like honey had changed somehow,
I was looking for something different.

source:
そうか？　自覚はないが……海外研修の成果かな？
それとも、この数か月で顔つきが変わったとか……
translatedstr:
Really? I'm not aware of it, but I'm not sure if it's the result of ...... overseas training.
Or maybe your face has changed in the last few months. ......

source:
……そういえば、ハニー。
海外に行ってる間、浮気とかしなかった？
translatedstr:
...... Oh, by the way, honey.
Did you have any affairs while you were abroad?

source:
う、浮気って。また誤解が生じそうなことを……。
俺は海外研修に行っていたんだから……
translatedstr:
Ugh, cheating...another misleading thing .......
I was on an overseas training program. ......

source: そんなことはないぞ
translatedstr: That's not true.

source:
そんなことない……
かも
translatedstr:
That's not true: ......
may

source:
そんなことは
あったぞ
translatedstr:
I don't think so.
There it is.

source: そんなことはないぞ。あるわけない
translatedstr: That's not true.

source:
あはっ☆　ホント？　ハニーがハッキリ
言ってくれて、ミキ、とってもうれしい♪
translatedstr:
Really? Honey is very clear.
I'm so glad you said that, Miki.

source:
そんなことはない……かも。
んー、いや、あれはどうなんだろう……
translatedstr:
That's not true. ...... might be.
Hmmm, no, I don't know about that one: ......

source:
むー、なにぶつぶつ言ってるの～？
あやしい、ミキに何か隠してるってカンジ！
translatedstr:
Moo, what are you mumbling~?
I have a feeling that he is hiding something from Miki!

source:
そんなことはあったぞ。
大人だからな、多少は、な
translatedstr:
I've had that happen.
I'm an adult. Somewhat.

source:
そ、そんな……ひどいの。
み、ミキ……待ってたのに……うっ、くすん……
translatedstr:
That's so ...... awful.
Mi, Miki ...... I was waiting for you ...... ugh, dusk ......

source:
お、おい、泣くなよ、美希！
冗談だって。少しからかっただけだ！
translatedstr:
Oh, hey, don't cry, Miki!
I was just teasing you!

source:
そもそも、みんなが待ってたんだから、
浮気とかするわけないだろ？
translatedstr:
In the first place, everyone was waiting for it,
How could I cheat on her or anything?

source:
なーんだ！
やっぱりハニーはミキたちにゾッコンなの♪
translatedstr:
What the heck!
I knew it! Honey is crazy about Miki and the kids!

source:
（確かにプロデューサーとして、俺はみんなに
ゾッコンではあるけど……まあ、いいか）
translatedstr:
(Sure, as a producer, I'm all for it.
(I know it's creepy, but ...... well, you know...)

source: （仕事終わりに、美希と公園にやってきた）
translatedstr: (After work, Miki and I came to the park.)

source:
ところで、美希。
ルミナスの活動は順調か？
translatedstr:
By the way, Miki.
How is Luminous doing?

source:
んー、とりあえずルミナス、面白いよ♪
なんか、すごい子いっぱいってカンジ？
translatedstr:
Hmmm...anyway, Luminous, it's fun...
What's it like to have so many great kids?

source:
そうか、美希がみんなのことを
すごいなって思うのは……
translatedstr:
Well, Miki is all over the place.
What I think is great is ......

source:
みんながキラキラ
してるところ
translatedstr:
Everyone sparkles
The place where I'm doing it.

source:
スタイルが
いいところ
translatedstr:
Style.
good thing

source: 可愛いところ
translatedstr: Cute place.

source:
誰もがキラキラしてるよな、
アイドルとして
translatedstr:
Everyone is sparkling, right?
as an idol

source:
うん♪　みんなキラキラしてるから、
ミキもつられて頑張っちゃおうかなーって♪
translatedstr:
Yes...Â Everyone is so sparkly,
Miki was thinking that she might as well hang in there...

source: みんなスタイルがいいところか？
translatedstr: Is that where they all have style?

source:
そうかもしれないけど、ミキだって
スタイルバツグンってこと、忘れないでほしいな☆
translatedstr:
Maybe so, but even Miki.
Don't forget that she's got style!

source: あっ、みんなかわいいところか？
translatedstr: Oh, you mean the part where everyone is cute?

source:
うーん。ルミナスに選ばれたアイドルだから、
みんなかわいくて当たり前だと思うな
translatedstr:
Hmmm...because I am an idol chosen by Luminous,
Don't take it for granted that everyone is cute.

source:
そうか……とにかく美希が問題なさそうで良かった。
これからもルミナスのみんなと、頑張ろうな
translatedstr:
Well ...... anyway, I'm glad Miki seems to be OK.
Let's keep up the good work with everyone at Luminous.

source:
うん。ミキ、のんびりするつもりだったけど
ちょっとだけ、やる気出しちゃうかも
translatedstr:
Yeah, Miki, I was going to take it easy.
Maybe I'll get a little motivated.

source:
頼むぞ、美希。
応援するからな
translatedstr:
Please, Miki.
I'll back you up.

source:
あはっ☆　それじゃ、ミキが一番頑張ったら、
ハニーからご褒美、ちょうだいね♪
translatedstr:
Haha☆ Then, if Miki does her best,
Give me a treat from honey...

source: （美希とフィットネスジムにやってきた）
translatedstr: (I came to the fitness gym with Miki)

source:
なんだかよくわからない道具が
いっぱい置いてあるの
translatedstr:
I'm not sure what the tool is.
I have a lot of them.

source:
鍛えたい筋肉の部分ごとに、
それぞれのマシンが用意されているみたいだな
translatedstr:
For each part of the muscle you want to train,
Sounds like you have a machine for each of them.

source:
ふーん、そうなんだ……。
ねぇ、ハニー。ミキはどこを鍛えればいいのかな？
translatedstr:
Hmmm, I see. ......
Hey honey, where do you think Miki should work out?

source:
美希が鍛えるところか……。
あえて挙げるとすれば……
translatedstr:
Is this where Miki works out? .......
Dare I mention ......

source: 体幹
translatedstr: soma

source: 胸筋
translatedstr: pectoral (muscle)

source: 足
translatedstr: leg

source:
どこの筋肉というより、体幹かな。
全体的なバランス感覚を鍛えるのが良さそうだ
translatedstr:
I'm not sure which muscles, but the core.
Seems like a good overall balancing act.

source:
あっ、ダンスのトレーナーさんにも同じことを
言われたの。よ～し、体幹を思いっきり鍛えるね！
translatedstr:
Oh, and the same for the dance trainer.
I was told, "Okay, I'm going to work on my core as hard as I can!

source:
うーん、胸……を鍛えてみるか？
胸筋とか
translatedstr:
Hmmm...maybe I should work on my chest ......?
Like the pectoral muscles.

source:
ミキは胸、もうじゅうぶんおっきい気がするけど……
でもハニーが言うなら、もっと鍛えてみようかな？
translatedstr:
Miki's breasts, I think they're big enough already. ......
But if honey says I should work out more?

source: 足を鍛えるといいんじゃないか？
translatedstr: Maybe you should work on your legs.

source:
え～？　ミキ、走るのは疲れるから、ヤ！
頑張るなら、もっと他の面白いヤツがいいの
translatedstr:
Miki, running is tiring, so yah!
If you're going to go for it, I'd rather go for something else more interesting.

source:
まあ、どこを鍛えるにしても、今後の活動を考えて、
無理なトレーニングはしないようにな
translatedstr:
Well, wherever you train, think about future activities,
Just don't overdo the training.

source:
あはっ☆　ミキが疲れて動けなくなったら、
ハニーがおんぶして連れて帰ってほしいの♪
translatedstr:
Haha☆ If Miki is too tired to move,
I want Honey to give me a piggyback ride and take me home.

source: はぁ……そうならないようにな！
translatedstr: Hah ...... don't let that happen!

source:
もぐもぐ……♪
う～ん、サイコーにおいしいの☆
translatedstr:
Mogu Mogu ......♪
It's so delicious!

source: ん？　何を食べてるんだ、美希
translatedstr: What are you eating, Miki?

source:
おにぎりだよ☆　差し入れでいっぱいもらったから、
ハニーも好きなのを選んで食べていいよ♪
translatedstr:
It's onigiri☆ I got a lot of them as gifts,
And honey, you can pick and choose what you want to eat... ♪

source:
それじゃ、遠慮なく……。
うん、うまいな
translatedstr:
Then feel free to visit .......
Yeah, it's good.

source:
あはっ☆　どれもおいしいおにぎりなの。
でも、おにぎりに一番大切なことってなんだろうね？
translatedstr:
Haha☆ They are all delicious rice balls.
But what's the most important thing about rice balls?

source:
おいしいおにぎりに大切なこと？
そうだなあ……
translatedstr: What's important for a good rice ball?

source: 愛情
translatedstr: love

source: 力加減
translatedstr: (degree of) effort

source: 鮮度
translatedstr: (degree of) freshness

source:
愛情、かな。気持ちをこめるっていうか……
手作りなんかだと尚更、そうなんだろうな
translatedstr:
Love, I guess, or putting feelings into it. ......
I'm sure it's even more so when it's handmade.

source:
気持ちがこもる……かあ。うん、そうだね☆
さすが、ハニー♪　イイこと言うの！
translatedstr:
I'm feeling .........yeah, right☆...
You're right, honey...you do have a good point!

source:
力加減じゃないか。優しく握らないと、
ガチガチのおにぎりになりそうだからな
translatedstr:
You have to grip it gently,
It's going to be a stiff rice ball.

source:
優しく、かー。でもそういうの、
力だけじゃなくて、気持ちが大事だよね☆
translatedstr:
Gently, huh, but that kind of thing,
It's not just about power, it's about feelings☆.

source:
鮮度じゃないかな？
具も新鮮な方がおいしいぞ
translatedstr:
Isn't it freshness?
The fresher the ingredients, the better it tastes.

source:
それ、おいしいかどうかと関係あるの？
ミキにはよくわかんないけど……
translatedstr:
What does that have to do with whether it tastes good or not?
I don't know about Miki, but ......

source:
しかし……おいしいものって、腹が減ってると
さらにおいしく感じるよな……
translatedstr:
But ...... good food is when you're hungry.
It tastes even better. ......

source:
それじゃ今度、ハニーがお腹が空いてるとき、
ミキがオリジナルのおにぎりを作ってあげるの！
translatedstr:
Then next time, when honey is hungry,
Miki will make you an original rice ball!

source:
そうか……そうだな。
楽しみにしてるよ
translatedstr:
Well, ......, I guess so.
Looking forward to it.

source: （そろそろ美希のレッスンが終わる頃だが……）
translatedstr: (It's almost time for Miki's lesson to end. ......)

source:
おーい、美希！　……って
なんだ、寝てるじゃないか……
translatedstr:
Hey, Miki! ...... says
What, you're sleeping. ......

source:
あふぅ……ミキ全力でレッスンしたから眠いの……。
ハニー、だっこ
translatedstr:
Ahhhh ...... Miki I'm sleepy because I did my best lesson .......
Honey, take a cuddle.

source:
だっこ、って……。
しょうがないな、事務所までだぞ！
translatedstr:
A cuddle, says .......
I can't help it. It's all the way to the office!

source:
はぁはぁ……事務所に着いたぞ。
ここからは、自分で立てるだろ
translatedstr:
Hahahaha, I'm at the ...... office.
You can stand on your own from here.

source:
あはっ☆　お姫様だっこ、気持ちよかったの♪
ねぇ、ハニーもドキドキで楽しかった？
translatedstr:
Haha☆ It felt so good to be a princess.
Hey, honey, did you have fun with the pounding?

source: ドキドキしたかって……。それはもちろん……
translatedstr: I asked ...... if I was thrilled, which of course I was. ......

source: ドキドキ
translatedstr: pitapat

source: ハラハラ
translatedstr: suspense

source: ヒヤヒヤ
translatedstr: feeling chilly

source:
ドキドキしたに決まっているだろ。
抱っこしているんだから距離も近いし、それに……
translatedstr:
Of course you were thrilled.
You're holding her in your arms, so you're very close, and besides, ......

source:
ハニーがドキドキしてくれて嬉しいな。ミキもね、
ずーっとドキドキして、幸せな気持ちだったよ？
translatedstr:
I'm glad Honey is thrilled, and so is Miki,
I was thrilled and happy the whole time, you know?

source:
どっちかっていうと、ハラハラ……かな。
誰かに見られていたらまずいって、思っていたよ
translatedstr:
I think it's more of a hara-hara .......
I thought it would be bad if someone was watching me.

source:
そうなの？　誰もミキたちのことを
気にしないって思うけど……
translatedstr:
Is that so? No one knows about Miki and the others.
I don't think they care. ......

source:
ヒヤヒヤしたよ……
通報されるかもしれないだろ？
translatedstr:
I chickened out: ......
You might get reported, right?

source:
ツーホー？　もしかして、ハニー、
ミキをだっこするのイヤだった？
translatedstr:
Two Ho? Maybe, honey,
Didn't you like carrying Miki in your arms?

source:
とにかく、お姫様だっこなんて今日だけだぞ。
それに、こんなことを俺以外に頼まないように！
translatedstr:
Anyway, it's the only day you get to be a princess.
And don't ask anyone but me to do something like this!

source:
うんっ！　それに、こういうお願いをするのは
ハニーだけなの♪
translatedstr:
Besides, it's not like I'm asking you to do this.
♪ It's only honey ♪

source:
（仕事の帰り、美希の希望で
コンビニに寄ることになった……）
translatedstr:
(After work, at Miki's request.
(I had to stop at a convenience store: ......)

source:
ねえ、ハニー。ミキ、今日いっぱい
頑張ったから、ご褒美がほしいな
translatedstr:
Hey, honey, Miki, all today.
I've worked hard, and I'd like a reward.

source:
今日の美希も良く頑張ったからな。
よし、何か買おう！
translatedstr:
Because Miki did a great job today.
Okay, let's buy something!

source:
（美希へのご褒美か……
何がいいかな……？）
translatedstr:
(Is this a reward for Miki? ......
What would you like ......?)

source: アイス
translatedstr: ice cream

source: 肉まん
translatedstr: manju (steamed bun) with meat filling

source: 駄菓子
translatedstr: cheap sweets

source: 美希、ご褒美のアイスだ
translatedstr: Miki, here's your reward: ice cream.

source:
あはっ☆　ハニー､ありがと！
うーん、甘くておいしいの～♪
translatedstr:
Haha* Thanks, honey!
Mmmm, so sweet and delicious~♪

source: （よし！　すごく喜んでくれているな……！）
translatedstr: (Okay! You're making me very happy. ......!)

source: 美希、ご褒美の肉まんだ
translatedstr: Miki, here's your reward, a steamed bun.

source:
ハニー、ミキのためにありがとうなの。
肉まん、おいしいの！
translatedstr:
Honey, thank you for Miki.
Steamed meat buns, they're delicious!

source: （ふう。どうやら喜んでくれたみたいだ）
translatedstr: (Wind...apparently he was pleased.)

source: 美希、ご褒美の駄菓子だ
translatedstr: Miki, here's your reward: candy.

source:
んー、ありがと、ハニー……。でも、
この駄菓子、あんまり好きじゃないの……
translatedstr:
Hmm, thanks, honey. ....... But,
I don't really like this candy. ......

source: （うーん、あんまり喜んでくれなかったみたいだ）
translatedstr: (Hmmm, he didn't seem too pleased.)

source:
（仕事の合間の気分転換に、
美希とゲームセンターに来た）
translatedstr:
(For a change of pace between jobs,
I came to the arcade with Miki.)

source:
ミキね、最近、杏や甜花とゲームして遊んでるんだ。
すっごく、うまくなってるんだよ！
translatedstr:
Miki, lately I've been playing games with Anzu and Tenka-chan.
It's getting really, really good!

source:
そのふたりとなら、相当上手になれそうだな。
対戦するとなったら、お手柔らかに頼むぞ
translatedstr:
I think I could get pretty good with those two.
If we're going to play against each other, I'm going to ask you to go easy on me.

source: さて、どのゲームにしようか……
translatedstr: Now, which game shall we play: ......

source: 音楽ゲーム
translatedstr: musical (music) game

source: 写真を撮るゲーム
translatedstr: Photography Games

source: カプセルトイ
translatedstr: capsule toy

source:
よし、音楽ゲームにしよう。これなら操作も
難しくないし、美希も楽しめると思うぞ
translatedstr:
Okay, let's make it a music game.
It's not hard, and I think you'll enjoy it, Miki.

source:
あはっ☆　このゲーム、ふたりとやったことあるの♪
ミキ、負けないよ？
translatedstr:
Haha☆ I've played this game with both of you
Miki, I won't lose, okay?

source: （よし！　すごく喜んでくれているな……！）
translatedstr: (Okay! You're making me very happy. ......!)

source:
よし、このゲームにしよう。
撮れた写真は、持って帰れるみたいだぞ
translatedstr:
Okay, let's play this game.
It looks like you can take the pictures you get and take them home with you!

source:
あはっ☆　ハニーとゲームセンターに来た、
記念の写真だね♪　やろうやろうー！
translatedstr:
Haha* I came to the arcade with my honey,
It's a commemorative photo. ♪ Let's do it, let's do it!

source: （ふう。どうやら喜んでくれたみたいだ）
translatedstr: (Wind...apparently he was pleased.)

source:
カプセルトイにしよう。
美希の好きそうなかわいいものもあるし
translatedstr:
Let's make it a capsule toy.
There are some cute things that Miki would like.

source:
ねえ、ハニー。
これって……ゲームなの？
translatedstr:
Hey, honey.
Is this a ...... game?

source: （うーん、あんまり喜んでくれなかったみたいだ）
translatedstr: (Hmmm, he didn't seem too pleased.)

source:
ねぇ、ハニー。お昼寝もいいけど、
たまにはお出かけもいいかなって思うの
translatedstr:
Hey, honey...naps are good,
I just think it's nice to go out once in a while.

source:
そうだな……。それじゃ、
今度の休みにでも、どこか行こうか
translatedstr:
Right. ....... Okay, then,
Let's go somewhere on our next vacation.

source:
（美希と出かける、か……。
行くとしたら、どこがいいかな？）
translatedstr:
(Out with Miki, or .......
(If we were to go, where would be the best place to go?)

source: 噴水広場
translatedstr: fountain square

source: 浜辺
translatedstr: beach

source: ショッピングモール
translatedstr: shopping mall

source:
噴水のある広場に行って、
のんびりするのはどうだ？
translatedstr:
Go to the plaza with the fountain,
How about we take it easy?

source:
あはっ☆　それは楽しそうなの。
広場のベンチで、クレープとか食べたいかも♪
translatedstr:
Haha* That sounds like fun.
Maybe I'll have a crepe or something on a bench in the plaza...

source: （よし、美希は楽しみにしているようだ）
translatedstr: (Okay, Miki seems to be looking forward to it.)

source: 気分転換に浜辺でも行ってみるか
translatedstr: Let's go to the beach for a change.

source:
浜辺に行って何するの？
でも、ハニーとだったら楽しそうなの♪
translatedstr:
What do you do when you go to the beach?
But I think it would be fun with honey.

source: （うん、美希の希望に沿えたようだ）
translatedstr: (Yes, it looks like I've done what Miki wanted.)

source: ショッピングモールに買い物に行こうか
translatedstr: Shall we go shopping at the mall?

source:
んー。ミキ、毎日のレッスンで疲れてるから、
あんまりお買い物って気分じゃないの……
translatedstr:
Miki, I'm tired from my daily lessons,
I'm not really in the mood for much shopping: ......

source: （うーん、あんまり喜んでくれなかったか……）
translatedstr: (Hmmm, I guess they weren't too happy with me. ......)

source:
（美希の仕事終わり、
気分転換を兼ねて出かけることにした……）
translatedstr:
(Miki's work is done,
I decided to go out for a change (......)

source:
（もうこんな時間か……。
美希も楽しんでくれたようだな）
translatedstr:
(Is it that time already? .......
(Miki seems to have enjoyed it.)

source:
今日はとっても楽しかったの！
また連れて行ってね、ハニー♪
translatedstr:
I had a lot of fun today!
Take me out again, honey ♪

source:
あはっ、今日はミキ的に楽しかったって思うな。
さすがハニー。次も期待してるからね☆
translatedstr:
Haha, don't think I had fun today, Miki-like.
That's my honey, and I'm looking forward to the next one.

source: あれは……おーい、美希！
translatedstr: That's ...... Oh, Miki!

source: あ、ハニー！　おはようなの～！
translatedstr: Oh, honey! Good morning~!

source:
……美希、その呼び方はやめるように言っただろう。
誰に聞かれているか、わからないんだから
translatedstr:
...... Miki, I told you to stop calling me that.
You never know who's listening.

source:
あはっ☆
周りには誰もいないから、ヘーキなの♪
translatedstr:
ahaha*
There's no one else around, so it's a heck of a lot easier.â

source:
まあ、それならいいが……。
ところで、ルミナスの活動のほうは順調か？
translatedstr:
Well, that's fine, but you can find out more at .......
By the way, how is the Luminous activity going?

source:
うん！　みんなすごい子ばっかりだから、
ミキは安心してお昼寝ができるの～。あふぅ
translatedstr:
Yes! They are all amazing kids,
Miki can take a nap in peace~ ah!

source:
昼寝ばっかりされるのは困るから、
レッスンや活動の時には、しっかり起きるようにな
translatedstr:
I don't want her to take naps all the time,
Get up for your lessons and activities.

source:
うん！　ハニーのために、
ミキなりに頑張ってみるね♪
translatedstr:
Yeah! For honey,
I'll try my best in my own way.

source: ああ、よろしく頼む
translatedstr: Yeah, nice to meet you.

source: ハニー！　おはようなの～！
translatedstr: Honey! Good morning~!

source:
うわっ。美希、急に飛び付いたら危ないぞ。
っと、それよりもその呼び方は……
translatedstr:
Miki, it's dangerous if you jump on me suddenly.
Oh, and that's more what we call it: ......

source:
ミキ、ちゃーんと、周りに誰もいないって
確認したよ。ハニーってば心配性なの☆
translatedstr:
Miki, you know, there's no one around.
I checked, honey, you're such a worrier.

source:
ねえ、こうして朝から出会うって、なんだか運命を
感じちゃうよね！　このままどっかに遊びに行くの！
translatedstr:
Hey, meeting like this in the morning, it's kind of like fate.
I can feel it! I'm going to go play somewhere like this!

source:
今日もレッスンと活動でいっぱいだろう。
全部済んだら、考えてみるよ
translatedstr:
Today will be full of lessons and activities.
I'll think about it when it's all done.

source:
ほんとにー♪　それじゃあ、ハニーと
デートのために、いっぱい頑張るの！
translatedstr:
I'll be right with you, honey.
I work so hard for my dates!

source:
ハニー、まだお仕事してるの～？
そんなにお仕事して、大変なの……
translatedstr:
Honey, are you still working~?
You work so hard, it's hard ......

source:
大変だけど、みんなのためなら、
少しくらい忙しくたって、頑張れるからな
translatedstr:
It's a lot of work, but it's for everyone,
I'll work hard, even if I'm a little busy.

source:
そっか☆　ハニーは、いつもミキたちのために、
頑張ってくれてるんだ
translatedstr:
I see* Honey is always there for Miki and her friends,
They're doing a great job.

source:
ああ、美希たちが頑張っている分、
俺もそれに応えないといけないからな
translatedstr:
Oh, for all the hard work Miki and her team are doing,
Because I have to live up to it, too.

source:
あはっ☆　ハニーは頑張り屋さんなんだね。
あのね……、いつもプロデュース、ありがとうなの
translatedstr:
Haha* Honey is a hard worker, isn't she?
You know, ......, I always produce, thank you!

source:
ミキ、ハニーと一緒なら、
もっと頑張れるって思うな♪
translatedstr:
Miki, if you are with honey,
Don't think you can do better

source:
それは心強いな。聞いて安心したよ。
お互いに、色んな経験をして成長していこう！
translatedstr:
That's reassuring to hear.
Let's grow through many experiences with each other!

source:
あふぅ……おはようなの、ハニー。ミキ、まだ
眠いから……。事務所まで連れてってほしいな……
translatedstr:
Ahu...... good morning, honey, Miki, still
I'm sleepy. ....... I wish you would take me to your office. ......

source: おはよう、ハニー☆　一緒に事務所に行くの♪
translatedstr: Good morning, honey☆ We're going to the office together.

source:
ハニー、今日もお疲れ様☆
明日もハニーに会えるの、楽しみにしてるね♪
translatedstr:
Honey, thanks again for your hard work today☆.
I'm looking forward to seeing you again tomorrow, honey.

source:
あふぅ……。疲れたから眠いの……
ハニー、ミキの家まで運んでいってほしいの……
translatedstr:
Ahhhh ....... I'm tired and sleepy ......
Honey, I need you to carry me to Miki's house: ......

source:
よし、今日の営業は……。
テレビ番組の『食べ歩きおにぎりツアー』か
translatedstr:
Okay, today's business is .......
The TV show "Eating and Walking Onigiri Tour"?

source:
あはっ☆　お仕事でおにぎりを
食べられるなんてラッキーなの♪
translatedstr:
Haha☆ Onigiri at work.
♪ I'm so lucky to be able to eat ♪

source:
おにぎりの感想も大事だけど、
おいしそうに食べるのが第一だと思うぞ
translatedstr:
It's important to have feedback on the rice balls,
I'm pretty sure the first thing you need to do is eat well.

source:
おいしそうに食べればいいの？
それなら、ミキ、簡単にできるって思うな☆
translatedstr:
Should I just eat it like it tastes good?
Then, Miki, don't think it's easy.

source:
でも、もっとおいしそうに見えたほうがいいよね。
どんなカンジで食べたら伝わるのかな？
translatedstr:
But it should look more delicious.
What kind of food do you think they would like to eat?

source:
普段の美希の感じでも十分伝わりそうだけど、
えーと……
translatedstr:
I think the usual Miki feel is enough to get the message across,
Let's see: ......

source: 唇をペロっとする
translatedstr: Lip smacking

source: いつも通りで
translatedstr: As usual.

source: ご飯粒を口につける
translatedstr: eat a grain of rice

source: 少しずつ食べる
translatedstr: eat a little at a time

source:
おにぎりを食べたあとに、
唇をペロッとしてみてもいいんじゃないか？
translatedstr:
After eating rice balls,
You could try perching your lips on it.

source:
ペロッと？　よくわかんないけど、
それでやってみるの！
translatedstr:
Pellotto? I'm not sure,
That's what I'm trying to do!

source:
わぁ！　すっごく大きなおにぎりなの！
いただきまーす☆　もぐもぐ……
translatedstr:
Wow! It's a very big onigiri!
Bon appétit ☆ mogu ......

source:
んん、唇にお米がついちゃったの。
ねぇねぇ、ちゃんと取れたか見てほしいな☆
translatedstr:
Mmm, I got rice on my lips.
Hey, hey, I want you to see if you got it right.

source:
（ペロリと舌を出した美希はとても小悪魔的で、
視聴者に大ウケ！　高視聴率を獲得した！）
translatedstr:
(Miki was very devilish, sticking out her tongue,
(It was a big hit with viewers, and got high ratings!)

source:
美希はおにぎりが大好きだし、
いつも通り食べるのが一番じゃないか？
translatedstr:
Miki loves rice balls,
Isn't it best to eat as usual?

source:
いつも通りでいいんだね。
ミキ、どんなおにぎりが食べられるのか楽しみなの♪
translatedstr:
So it's business as usual?
Miki, I'm looking forward to seeing what kind of onigiri I can eat!

source:
んん～！　このおにぎりすっごくおいしいの♪
ミキ、何個だって食べられちゃいそう！
translatedstr:
These onigiri are so delicious!
Miki, I could eat as many as I want!

source:
（いつも通りおいしそうに頬張る美希が、
自然体で好印象だとクライアントから褒められた）
translatedstr:
(Miki, as usual, chewing deliciously,
(Clients complimented me on my natural appearance, which made a good impression.)

source: そうだ！　米粒を口につけてみるのはどうだ？
translatedstr: Yes! How about putting a grain of rice in your mouth?

source:
なんかそういうのって、お行儀が悪いカンジ……。
でも、挑戦してみるね
translatedstr:
Something like that is not a good behavior. ......
But I'll give it a shot.

source:
いただきます、う、んと……ええと、よし出来た！
口にお米ついちゃったの～
translatedstr:
I'll take it, um, and ...... um, okay, it's done!
I got rice on my mouth.

source: （わざとらしすぎてＮＧになってしまった……）
translatedstr: (Too deliberate to be NG: ......)

source:
こういう食レポでは上品に少しずつ、それでいて
おいしそうに食べるのがいいんじゃないか？
translatedstr:
In a food report like this, you have to be elegant, a little bit at a time, but not too much.
You should eat like a delicious person, shouldn't you?

source:
え～、おにぎりってかぶりつくのがおいしいのに～。
……でも、わかったの。上品に食べてみるね！
translatedstr:
Oh, onigiri is so delicious when you bite into it!
...... but okay, I'll try to eat classy!

source:
ん～、待ってなの～。もぐ……もぐ……。
おにぎりを少しずつ食べるのって難しいの
translatedstr:
Hmmm...wait for it...mogu...... mogu......
It's hard for me to eat onigiri little by little.

source:
（美希は上品に食べてくれたけれど、
美希らしくないとＮＧになった……）
translatedstr:
(Though Miki ate it elegantly,
(If it's not like Miki, it's NG: ......)

source: （今回の仕事は成功だ！）
translatedstr: (This job was a success!)

source: （今回の仕事は失敗だ。次こそは！）
translatedstr: （This job was a mistake...next time!)

source:
（今回、『さわやか清涼飲料水』の
ＣＭに美希が起用された）
translatedstr:
(This time, the "refreshing soft drink
(Miki was used in the commercial)

source:
『水遊びをした若者たちが砂浜で語らう、青春感』
がテーマだそうだ。頑張ろうな！
translatedstr:
The young people who played in the water talked about it on the beach, and it gave them a sense of youth.
Let's do our best!

source:
あはっ☆　海に連れてってくれるの？
そうだ！　お仕事終わったら、一緒に海で遊ぼうよ！
translatedstr:
Haha☆ Will you take me to the beach?
Yes! After work, let's play at the beach together!

source:
海で遊ぶのは、終わってからだ。
まずは、撮影を頑張ろう
translatedstr:
We'll play in the ocean when we're done.
First, let's work on the shooting.

source:
うーん、ミキ、ＣＭに出れるのは嬉しいけど、
難しいってカンジ
translatedstr:
Hmmm, Miki, I'm happy to be in a commercial,
It feels like it's difficult.

source:
ねえねえ、どんなふうに考えて撮影すればいい？
プロデューサーも、一緒に考えてほしいな
translatedstr:
Hey, hey, how should I think about shooting?
I wish the producer would think about it with me.

source:
さわやか、水着……、青春……。
そうだな……
translatedstr: Refreshing, swimsuit ......, youth .......

source: 汗がはじける動き
translatedstr: Sweat bursting movement

source: 水が流れる胸元
translatedstr: where water flows through one's breast

source: 気だるげな仕草
translatedstr: languid gesture

source: 一気に飲み干す
translatedstr: drink the whole cup in one gulp

source:
さわやかと言ったら、汗がはじけるような
そんなパァッと明るいポーズはどうだ？
translatedstr:
When I say refreshing, I mean bursting with sweat.
How's that kind of puffy, bright pose?

source:
まるで美希と本当に海に来たような
気持ちになれると思うんだ
translatedstr:
It's as if Miki and I really came to the beach.
I think I can feel it.

source:
ミキと一緒に海に来たようなカンジ？
あはっ☆　ミキなんだかわかった気がするの！
translatedstr:
Like being at the beach with Miki?
Haha☆ Miki, I think I know what's going on!

source:
プロデューサー、見てて！
ミキ、バッチリ決めてくるから！
translatedstr:
Producer, watch!
Miki, I'm going to make a perfect decision!

source:
カメラマンさーん！
次はこのポーズなの♪
translatedstr:
Photographer!
♪ I'm in this pose next ♪

source:
おっ、いいねいいね、
いろんなポーズがどんどん決まって行くね！
translatedstr:
Whoa, good one, good one,
I see many poses being decided as we go along!

source:
（美希は元気いっぱいにポーズを決めた。
青春らしいと大好評だった！）
translatedstr:
(Miki posed energetically.
(It was a big hit with the youth!)

source:
せっかく水着だし、
水が流れる胸元もいいんじゃないか？
translatedstr:
I'm in a bathing suit,
Wouldn't it be nice to have a chest with water running down it?

source:
プロデューサーはえっちなの……。
ミキ、恥ずかしいけど、頑張ってみるね♪
translatedstr:
The producer is eh .......
Miki, I'm embarrassed, but I'll try my best... ♪

source:
ふぅ～♪　あ、プロデューサー！
ミキ、うまくできてた？　ドキドキした？
translatedstr:
Phew~♪ Oh, producer!
Miki, did you do well? Were you thrilled?

source:
（美希は恥ずかしがっていたものの、
カメラを向けられると流石のポージングを見せた）
translatedstr:
(Although Miki was embarrassed,
(When the camera was pointed at her, he showed her quintessential posing.)

source:
そうだな、気だるげな美希も
案外いいんじゃないかな？
translatedstr:
Yes, even the languid Miki.
It's not a good idea.

source:
それって本当に青春ってカンジ？
でも、ミキらしいもんね
translatedstr:
Does that really feel like youth?
But it's just like Miki.

source:
むー、プロデューサー！　ミキ、自分らしくしてたら
カメラマンさんに怒られちゃったの
translatedstr:
Moo, producer! Miki, if you just be yourself.
The photographer got mad at me.

source:
（うーん。指示した仕草が、
ＣＭのテーマに合わなかったか……）
translatedstr:
(Hmmm...the gesture you indicated,
(Didn't fit the theme of the commercial or ......)

source:
うん、一気に飲み干してみたらどうだ？
清涼感が演出できるかも！
translatedstr:
Yeah, why don't you try drinking it all at once?
It may create a sense of coolness!

source:
一気飲み……？　うーん、ミキ、
ちゃんと飲めるか不安ってカンジ
translatedstr:
One gulp ......? Hmmm, Miki,
I'm not sure if I can drink it properly.

source:
よ、よし……っ、ミキ、がんばる。
んくっ、んくっ……ごくん。く、苦しいの～
translatedstr:
Yo, okay, ......, Miki, I'll do my best.
Nggggggggg ............. I'm in pain~!

source:
（無理をして一気飲みをしようとしてしまい、
ＣＭのコンセプトと合わずにお蔵入りとなった）
translatedstr:
(I pushed myself and tried to drink it all in one gulp,
(It didn't fit the concept of the commercial, so it was kept.)

source: （今回の仕事は成功だ！）
translatedstr: (This job was a success!)

source: （今回の仕事は失敗だ。次こそは！）
translatedstr: （This job was a mistake...next time!)

source:
（今日は美希のサイン会だが、
美希はもう眠そうにしている……）
translatedstr:
(Today is Miki's signing day, though,
(Miki is already sleepy ......)

source:
……んー、ミキ、ず～っと座ってサインしてると、
なんだか眠たくなるの……あふぅ
translatedstr:
...... Hmmm, Miki, you said you sit there and sign all the time,
It kind of makes me want to sleep. ...... ahhh

source:
もうたくさんサインしたよ？
プロデューサー、ミキ、少し休憩したいって思うな
translatedstr:
I've already signed a lot of them, okay?
Producer, Miki, don't think I want to take a break.

source:
そうは言っても、ファンのみんなが
まだたくさん待っててくれてるしな……
translatedstr:
Having said that, I'm sure all the fans
And they're still waiting for a lot of them. ......

source:
ミキ、いいこと思いついたの。
ミキのサインをコピーして、みんなに、配ろ……？
translatedstr:
Miki, I have an idea.
Copy Miki's signature and hand them out to everyone at ......?

source:
こらこら、しゃべりながら目を閉じるんじゃない。
コピーを配るなんて、ダメに決まってるだろう
translatedstr:
Hey, hey, don't close your eyes while talking.
Giving away copies is a no-no, of course not.

source: むー、なら、どうしたらいいの？
translatedstr: Moo, then what should I do?

source:
そうだな、眠らずに
無事にサイン会を終わらせるには……
translatedstr:
Yes, don't sleep.
To end the signing successfully, please visit ......

source:
ファンと
握手をする
translatedstr:
Fans and
Shake hands.

source:
サインを
アレンジする
translatedstr:
Signature.
Arrange.

source:
眠気覚ましの
ドリンク
translatedstr:
Sleepyheads.
drink

source:
休息を
取らせる
translatedstr:
Rest.
make someone take

source: そうだ！　サインと一緒に握手しよう！
translatedstr: Yes! Let's shake hands with the sign!

source:
ミキのサインと、握手……。
分かった……頑張ってみるね
translatedstr:
Miki's autograph and a handshake at .......
Okay. I'll try my best at ......

source:
握手するときに、お辞儀したら、
きっと眠くならないって思うな♪
translatedstr:
If you bow when you shake hands,
Don't think you'll fall asleep.

source:
いいアイディアだと思うぞ。
じゃあ、次のファンを呼ぼう！
translatedstr:
I think that's a great idea.
Then let's call the next fan!

source:
（その後、美希はひとりひとり、
サインと握手に応じた）
translatedstr:
(Then Miki one by one,
(She agreed to sign autographs and shake hands.)

source:
（ファンの笑顔に美希はどんどんやる気になり、
最後まで元気にサイン会でファンを迎えた）
translatedstr:
(Miki became more and more motivated by the smiles of her fans,
(She greeted fans at the autograph session in good spirits until the end.)

source: よし、ひとりひとりサインを変えてみよう
translatedstr: Okay, let's change the signs one by one.

source:
あふぅ……眠いのに、サインを変えるって
大変ってカンジ。ミキ、ちゃんとできるかなぁ？
translatedstr:
Ahu...... sleepy, but he's changing her sign.
I wonder if I can do it right.

source:
あ、お兄さん、わんちゃんに似てるってカンジ！
横に書いてあげるね☆
translatedstr:
Oh, brother, you look like a doggie!
I'll write it on the side for you.

source:
（美希はその後、サインを少しずつアレンジ
しながら、眠ることなくサイン会をこなした）
translatedstr:
(Miki then arranged the signatures a little
(She did not sleep and signed autographs while doing so.)

source:
（ファンも自分だけのサインを手に入れて
満足そうにしている）
translatedstr:
(Fans also get their own personalized autographs.
(She looks satisfied.)

source: 眠気覚ましのドリンクを飲もう！
translatedstr: Take a drowsy drink!

source:
ええ～……！　ミキ、飲みたくないけど、
お仕事だから、頑張って飲むの
translatedstr:
Yeah~......! Miki, I don't want to drink, but,
It's your job, so drink as hard as you can.

source:
……うう、プロデューサー、
眠くなくなったけど、胸がムカムカってカンジ……
translatedstr:
...... ugh, producer,
I'm not sleepy anymore, but I feel sick to my chest. ......

source: （美希の眠気を覚ますことには成功した……）
translatedstr: (I succeeded in waking Miki up from her sleep: ......)

source:
（けれど、ドリンクの種類が悪かったのか、
美希の笑顔はぎこちなかった……）
translatedstr:
(But was it the wrong kind of drink?
(Miki's smile was awkward ......)

source:
仕方ないな。
じゃあ、少しだけ休憩だ
translatedstr:
I don't have a choice.
Okay, we'll take a short break.

source:
あはっ♪　ありがとうなの！
すこし寝たら、ミキ、頑張れるって思うな！
translatedstr:
Haha...thank you!
After a little sleep, Miki, don't think you'll be able to do your best!

source:
……すぅ……すぅ……。
ううん……まだ寝るの……
translatedstr:
...... soooooo ...... soooo .......
Nah ...... still sleeping ......

source:
（少しのはずが美希が熟睡してしまい
サイン会は中止になってしまった……）
translatedstr:
(It was supposed to be a little, but Miki fell sound asleep.
(The signing has been cancelled: ......)

source: （今回の仕事は成功だ！）
translatedstr: (This job was a success!)

source: （今回の仕事は失敗だ。次こそは！）
translatedstr: （This job was a mistake...next time!)
